skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Extinguish
skill.description:
To extinguish a set of 'Fire'.
When several fires should be extinguished, the agent acts on each fire by following the order of the elements into the 'fires' list.
A visited fire won't be extinguished if it is already extinguished or if it doesn't exist anymore.

parameter.name: fires
parameter.description: An ordered list of fires that need to be extinguished.

link.name: reach
link.description: To move to the populated area to evacuate

link.name: extinguish
link.description: To activate the decision of extinguishing fires.

argument.name: fire
argument.description: The fire that has been extinguished.

feedback.name: notExtinguished
feedback.description: Sent each time a 'Fire' cannot be extinguished (no pysical capability for instance).

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "Fires" have been visited.
